entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
